data.message:
R.I.P to the victims of the #ParisAttacks. #prayforparis .....terrorism has no religion....we all condemn terrorist attack on france...But it baffles the mind how the western media pretty much neglect to report the same acts of terrorism in the Middle East and other third world countries, but are quick to spread and broadcast the news when it relates to the western countries. There are innocent lives shed all over the world, not only in the West.
'Pray for Paris.
But also pray for Baghdad
For Beirut 
For Sanaa 
For Aden 
For Karbala 
For Najaf 
For Mosul 
For Diyarbakir 
For Mogadishu
For Kandahar 
For Kabul 
For Islamabad
For Damascus 
For Homs 
For the innocent, trapped people of Raqqa For the Sinai Peninsula 
For Qatif and al-Hasa governate, Saudi Arabia 
For Bahrain 
For Gaza 
For the West Bank
And EVERY SINGLE city and country that has been a victim of western imperialism and 'islamist' extremism.
I am not Paris, nor France. I am Humanity.'

replies.message: And pray for Romania, too, becouse now 2 weeks died a lot of people in a fire, and nobody help us....
